message.raw:
Disable tests compilation by default. New 'make tests' target.

Exclude all tests compilation from 'make all' so a simple 'make' call won't
compile any of the tests. The whole test suite can be compiled by running 'make
tests'.All the individual tests make targets are generated when calling cmake
so they are available in the form of 'make <binary_test_name>' (i.e make
UNIT_gz_TEST).
